scripts.dev: rm -rf .next && rm -rf /build && cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_EXPORT_MODE=false next build && next dev --turbopack
scripts.build:static: rm -rf .next rm -rf /build && cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_EXPORT_MODE=true next build
scripts.start: rm -rf .next rm -rf /build && cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_EXPORT_MODE=false next build && next start
scripts.images:head:prepare: npm run images:sanitize && npm run images:head:index
